abstract.text: A build phase action used to run a script.

inlineContent.text: Target scripts, represented as target script build phases in the generated Xcode projects, are useful to define actions to be executed before of after the build process of a target.

abstract.text: Name of the build phase when the project gets generated.

Returns a target script that gets executed before the sources and resources build phase.
